title: Briody-Iron Triangle(corporations who profit from wars)
description:
This Dan Briody&#039;s explosive book The Iron Triangle - Inside The Secret World Of The Carlyle Group (2003) which exposes this privately owned cartel which largely profits from US military endeavours around the world. The people associated with this allpowerful group are mainly government or corporate insiders which have put their skills at work in this incestous group which represents the ultimate merger of state and corporation. If you want to meet people that actually profit from all the bloodshed and wars going on today be sure to pick up this amazing book. For bussinesses such as Carlyle group 11th September 2001 attacks were like a blessing from the sky. 230 pages, few documents. A must read from everyone.
